title: WebAuthn becomes official hardware login standard for browsers like Apple's Safari - AppleInsider
description: The World Wide Web Consortium and the FIDO Alliance have certified WebAuthn as an official Web standard, allowing users of compatible browsers --  Safari among them --  to turn to hardware logins instead of passwords.
